title: It_Is_2022_AD
author: It_Is_2022_AD
content: HIRING SEVERAL FORUM POSTER s. Contact Immediately.CONTACT MY SKYPE : live:.cid.4433a41dc76686feLONG TERM CONTRACT.

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: There is no need to contact you in private. You are a newbie with no forum background. If you want to hire forum members, either you have to pay upfront, or you have to escrow the funds. Only after that forum members can deal with you. You won't get any response without escrowing the funds. Don't waste your time here.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: You are just barely a month old on this forum, and here you go about looking for forum poster to do what? If I may ask. Because it seems you are yet to understand how this forum works, because if you do need a forum poster, then all you will to do is contact any of the campaign managers I will be mentioning, such as Royse777, Hhampus or Cryptopreneurbrainboss to help you manage whatever project you may like to promote on this forum, as long as it's not a scam. So thank you, and I'm wishing you good luck.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: OP already has a thread like this back in October, Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.There's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.

comments.author: Rivaldine
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMOP already has a thread like this back in October, Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.There's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.I already thought it to be a good job in the waiting before I saw your comment, I know loads of things go down in the space but I didn't look at the account nor the supposed the details I'm supposed to consider before even applying. Thanks for the eye opener.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Rivaldine on July 13, 2023, 08:20:33 AMQuote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMOP already has a thread like this back in October, Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.There's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.I already thought it to be a good job in the waiting before I saw your comment, I know loads of things go down in the space but I didn't look at the account nor the supposed the details I'm supposed to consider before even applying. Thanks for the eye opener.I remember commenting on a similar offer, I checked his posts history and found out that it was him also, we don't know his motives but we should doubt if a newbie is posting incomplete details and wants a one on one communication, or if they only want to collect sensitive information, so many of his posts are questionable but we cannot tag him unless someone files a complaint but this account is suspicious I encourage everyone before you take anyone's offer check their trust rating and posts history, from there you will get an idea on their intentions.

comments.author: Rivaldine
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMOP already has a thread like this back in October, Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.There's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.So I decided to go dig up on some contents around and noticed that loads of  people come with fishing intentions but makes it look like a job. It ain't really certain as to what the job scope is as posting has to be defined. so, until 'the cards come on the table', I think I'll just pass

comments.author: bitcoin-shark
comments.body: Here i am at your service just dm me ...

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Chances are that the OP is just an alt account so the owner won't compromise a higher rank one if his business idea goes wrong. We are used to bounty, review, signature campaigns that are transparent here and anyone can check the spreadsheets, but there is also another market that is not so openly announced.Of course, those who want to dig into it must take the risk: with open campaigns one has the protection of the community somehow (we are all judges of everything that happens in the forum) and escrow is the general rule, but there are groups that work otherwise. And some of them are legit, so I wouldn't demonise the opening poster just because his proposal is not public, although I appreciate that you're pushing him to explain the details of the deal.About the price, 13$ for an 8 hours work seems really low to me and it should be explained.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Porfirii on July 15, 2023, 11:56:01 AMChances are that the OP is just an alt account so the owner won't compromise a higher rank one if his business idea goes wrong. We are used to bounty, review, signature campaigns that are transparent here and anyone can check the spreadsheets, but there is also another market that is not so openly announced.Of course, those who want to dig into it must take the risk: with open campaigns one has the protection of the community somehow (we are all judges of everything that happens in the forum) and escrow is the general rule, but there are groups that work otherwise. And some of them are legit, so I wouldn't demonise the opening poster just because his proposal is not public, although I appreciate that you're pushing him to explain the details of the deal.About the price, 13$ for an 8 hours work seems really low to me and it should be explained.Did I miss a post where he mentioned his rate? Doesn.t seem like he is hiring users for posting on forum for that rate. As far as demonizing the OP, if he makes a post looking for workers then he should share some details with the users he might be looking to hire. Otherwise, we can assume he likely has bad intentions.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMThere's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.Maybe members who applied in the other thread can help us shade more light on what kind of games OP is up to.PaulBf1, rat03gopoh, malcovi2, inthelongrun, bitbollo, gunhell16, Docnaster what kind of tasks did OP give you last time around or is he up to some naught games?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 16, 2023, 12:21:40 AMQuote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMThere's no update on that thread many have posted their telegram channel I wonder if OP did contact these members and hired them I hope one of those who worked on OP will give us feedback if what OP is offering is true there's no additional information on the forum posting, the pay rate is tempting but the task is questionable.Maybe members who applied in the other thread can help us shade more light on what kind of games OP is up to.PaulBf1, rat03gopoh, malcovi2, inthelongrun, bitbollo, gunhell16, Docnaster what kind of tasks did OP give you last time around or is he up to some naught games?I don't remember what task proposed OP but considering that I didn't participate, I wasn't interested in participating, else I didn't remember... I think it wasn't one of those "once in a lifetime" opportunities I join the suggestion: OP @It_Is_2022_AD clearly explains what you are looking for, what service you want to receive and what you offer. talk about it publicly, it is an attitude that gives seriousness to what you do and helps users understand whether or not they can participate ... personally, I have not skype account so it's kind hard get in touch ....

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: This guy created this thread on 12th July and was last seen is 12th July.We are spamming his thread with suggestions while he is away   Better let it go, as it's obvious that he is not going to hire anyone, and I don't think any forum member would work with someone who does not have a forum background and he is asking to contact in private.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: I began having doubts with the OP when he did not disclose the name of the forum in the first place. If it’s a legit one, then why the OP doesn’t want to disclose it here publicly rather than waiting DMs from the interested applicants?Plus he has no established reputation in this forum with a low rank. Let’s hear from the other members who have applied to the OP’s offer before, but I just hope they would tell the truth rather than getting paid by that OP’s forum to publish fake 5-star feedback.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on July 15, 2023, 10:55:13 PMQuote from: Porfirii on July 15, 2023, 11:56:01 AM-snip-About the price, 13$ for an 8 hours work seems really low to me and it should be explained.Did I miss a post where he mentioned his rate? Doesn.t seem like he is hiring users for posting on forum for that rate. As far as demonizing the OP, if he makes a post looking for workers then he should share some details with the users he might be looking to hire. Otherwise, we can assume he likely has bad intentions.Well, he didn't post the price in this thread, but another member (robelneo) quoted a few posts above another post made by the OP a few months ago asking for a similar thing, so I assume that that is the price now to, although I may be wrong. Anyway, as other said, it doesn't seem that the creator of this topic will clarify this extent soon as he hasn't logged in since he posted his message.Quote from: robelneo on July 13, 2023, 06:14:01 AMOP already has a thread like this back in October, Quote from: It_Is_2022_AD on October 31, 2022, 10:12:51 AMHello,We are looking for about 10/10+ forum posters @ £10/day (8 hours/day). Long term for hire.Post below with your @Telegram.-snip-

comments.author: Freedom4All
comments.created_time: July 16, 2023, 01:29:45 PMLast edit: July 16, 2023, 01:40:11 PM by Freedom4All
comments.body: The original message is the same one you will receive at Fiverrr from over 100 users (that get all banned within a few minutes but enough time to spam you and get your attention) offering you "a great job" IF you contact them on Telegram.Here are the first three questions they'll ask when you reach out:What's your name?What's your location?How old are you?If you dodge these questions, they cleverly rephrase and repeat them, potentially tricking you into providing information without realizing it. But I don't know exactly what they're aiming for with you as the responder or with your information.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 16, 2023, 12:21:40 AM~I really wouldn't remember my proposal if you didn't mention me. I gave my telegram id in another thread, but I'm not sure that the op has ever tried to reach me since then.There were just a few random user messages looks like promotional spam which I immediately deleted without reading the details.Anyway, I'm also not interested in that offer anymore for now.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Freedom4All on July 16, 2023, 01:29:45 PMHere are the first three questions they'll ask when you reach out:What's your name?What's your location?How old are you?If you dodge these questions, they cleverly rephrase and repeat them, potentially tricking you into providing information without realizing it. But I don't know exactly what they're aiming for with you as the responder or with your information.I think it's some form of social engineering. Extracting as much information from the victims as possible so that they can be able to carry out some attacks such as hacking the user accounts by guessing the login credentials or maybe even impersonating the victims.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Indeed, all you need to do is express your desires and elaborate on the methods you prefer. Soon thereafter, you shall encounter an individual who is intrigued and aligns with the criteria outlined in this forum. It is far more preferable than repeatedly reiterating identical responses to distinct inquiries from various individuals as well.
